name: Bound to Break-Away
description:
Two prisoners are literally joined together as they try to escape the prison complex.

The game was made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

Controls: Hank the Hunk: WASD  (SPACE to Punch)    
                Mitch The Snitch: Arrows     
                Level restart: P

Level Design/"Music": Me

Programming: R.G.O.T.I. (He never used Godot before but I insisted on using it anyway, be easy on him please)

https://steamcommunity.com/id/RGOTI/

Art: Mr. First Opinion

Ending music: Jim Hall: Devotion

https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198369682127/
